On this branch: <https://github.com/DLC-link/canton/tree/feat/better-onboarding/releases>

If you go to `test`, and start one canton with _`canton -c simple-topology.conf --bootstrap <http://bootstrap.sc|bootstrap.sc>`_
Then in another terminal `./run-test.sh` should go through the entire flow.

Test script: <https://github.com/DLC-link/canton/blob/feat/better-onboarding/releases/test/run-test.sh>
